entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
